cab.content: Colonel W. Dally: Jones.THIS pOCutiENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT..SECRET . WAR CABINET.G.T.4758.NEXT LIEETING OF ALLIED NAVAL COUNCIL.Copy of letter dated 5th June 1918. from Secretary, Allied Naval Council to Secretary/War Cabinet.Sir,I am directed by the First Lord of the Admiraltyto inform you, for the information of the VIar Cabinet,that the Allied Naval Council will meet in London onTuesday and Wednesday next; June 11th and 12th, talerthe Presidency of the First Lord,It is understood that Vice-Admiral F.J.J.De Bon, Chief of the Naval General Staff, will attend onbehalf of France, and Rear-Admiral A. Triangi,DeputyChief of the Naval General Staff, on behalf of Italy.The United States of America will bo represented byyice-Admiral W.S. Sims, Commanding the United StatesNaval Forces in European Waters, and Japan by Rear-Admiral H. IIda, Naval Attache in London.I am, Sir,Your obedient Servant,(Sd.) T.E. CREASE.The Secretary, Captain, R.N.Offices of the War Cabinet, Secretary.2, Whitehall Gardens,O * ft alt
